FuncDef:
The nat centralized-backup manual switch command configures the manual switching function for centralized backup of distributed CGN.
The undo nat centralized-backup manual switch command restores the default configuration.
By default, the manual switching function for centralized backup of distributed CGN is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To ensure service continuity in case of a network or hardware upgrade on the BRAS, run the nat centralized-backup manual switch command to configure the manual switching function for centralized backup of distributed CGN.
Prerequisites
The automatic switching and switchback function for centralized backup of distributed CGN has been enabled using the nat centralized-backup enable command.
Configuration Impact
After user traffic is manually switched to centralized CGN devices for NAT implementation in centralized backup of distributed CGN, the public network resources on the BRAS will be reclaimed, causing fast aging of NAT session table entries.
Precautions
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
